Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister scored the opening goal in the 48th minute
Julian Alvarez scored a stunning goal in the 84th minute
Paulo Dybala scored the third goal in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: The match was a tribute to Angel Di Maria, who announced his international retirement after winning the Copa America
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Argentina's first since claiming the 2024 Copa America trophy
Others: Argentina stayed atop the CONMEBOL standings in World Cup qualifying, with 18 points out of 21
